title: Is justice just another name for revenge? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Justice is a legal or natural way of paying for what one has done. Whereas revenge is initiated by someone's personal agony.

This is imprecise. The question should be “is punishment just another name for revenge?” I would say no: while punishment can be motivated by revenge, it can be motivated by lots of things, most notably, the desire to deter future offenses.
